Class Pet

java.lang.Object
Pet
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bear, Cat, Dog
public class Pet extends Object
This class represents the pet. It creates the inital object, updates the attributes number of the pet, and handles the inventory There are also getters and setters for each variable. Date: Nov 28, 2024

      public boolean removeItem​(Items itemName, int quantity)
      Removes the item from the current inventory of the pet
      Parameters:
      itemName -
      quantity -
      Returns:
      True if the item was successfully removed or false if the quantity exceeded the amount of item it could delete or if there is no item with that name in the dictionary
